EmailTemplate.description: Export.gov: New Case (Non-Register) User Notification Email
EmailTemplate.name: Export.gov: New Case (Non-Register) User Notification Email
EmailTemplate.subject: New Case: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.SuppliedName},
Thank you for your Website Feedback for Export.gov at the U.S. Department of Commerceâ€™s International Trade Administration (ITA). We will work diligently to review and respond to your submission in a timely manner. Please note that the processing time will depend on the nature and completeness of the submission, as well as the volume of submissions received.
Case Number - {!Case.CaseNumber}
Case Status - {!Case.Status}
Sincerely,
Export.gov Team International Trade Administration Department of Commerce
[ {!Case.Thread_Id} ]
